actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend the Saccharin Study and Labeling Act to extend to December 31, 1982, the ban on actions by the Secretary of Health and Human Services respecting saccharin.

summary.text: Amends the Saccharin Study and Labeling Act to extend until December 31, 1982, the period during which the Secretary of Health and Human Services may not take certain actions to restrict the continued use of saccharin or of any food, drug, or cosmetic containing saccharin.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Saccharin Study and Labeling Act to extend to December 31, 1982, the ban on actions by the Secretary of Health and Human Services respecting saccharin.
